JOB DESCRIPTION:
Essential Job Duties and Responsibilities:   

Specific responsibilities include documenting,   implementing and refactoring software applications and components 

Interacting with client services staff to help diagnosing and correct customer problems 

Customizing software to integrate with third party software. 

Education and Experience:   

Graduation or higher in Computer Science or related field 

3 years of software development experience 

1 years of programming with VB or VB.NET 

Necessary Knowledge:   

VB or VB.NET development experience required 

Familiar with SQL 

Experience with MS SQL Server 2005 desirable 

Experience with Crystal Report desirable 

Experience with LeadTool Imaging toolkit desirable 

Knowledge of the design and implementation of the billing systems is a plus 

Ability to design and implement high-   quality software applications and components 

Ability to work with team and independently with excellent problem solving skills in a fast-   paced environment 

Good verbal and written communication skills
